snippet: Higher interest rates and privately owned banks can help strengthen the nation’s banking system.
abstract: Editorial supports China's plan to enact sweeping changes to strengthen country's banking system and benefit both ordinary citizens who wish to save money and small businesses; notes plans to remove government limits on interest rates and to allow opening of more banks; cautions government should move carefully to avoid precipitating financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Higher interest rates and privately owned banks can help strengthen the nation’s banking system.
